actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to extend for two years the authority to employ certain foreign citizens on the vessel ARCTIC TRAWLER (formerly the Seafreeze Atlantic).

summary.text: Extends for two years the authority to employ certain foreign citizens on the vessel "Arctic Trawler" (formerly the "Seafreeze Atlantic").

titles.title: A bill to extend for two years the authority to employ certain foreign citizens on the vessel ARCTIC TRAWLER (formerly the Seafreeze Atlantic).
